casebody.data:
SONN et al., Respondents, v. WEISSMANN et al., Appellants. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 26, 1899.) Action by Hyman Sonn and another against Henry A. Weissmann and another. From a judgment entered on a verdict found by direction of the court for plaintiffs, defendants appeal. Affirmed. James, Schell, Elkus & McGuire, for appellants. Hay-man & Rosenthal, for respondents. PER CURIAM.

Judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs.
